topic.title: Level Of Service Observation - conformance rules

section.p: CMS classification of service level for billing purposes

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11486 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.92"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11208)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10090)/@code="69464-6" Centers for medicare - medicaid, CMS, service level NEMSIS (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10091)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10092), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet EMSLevelOfService 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.70 DYNAMIC (CONF:10093)
NEMSIS Trace: EPayment.50
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11208)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10090)/@code="69464-6" Centers for medicare - medicaid, CMS, service level NEMSIS (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10091)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10092), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet EMSLevelOfService 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.70 DYNAMIC (CONF:10093)
NEMSIS Trace: EPayment.50

body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.92"/> <code code="69464-6" displayName="Centers for medicare - medicaid, CMS, service level NEMSIS"/> <value xsi:type="CD"/> </observation>
